summary: Website project for BISMI CABS, now expanding beyond the initial login page to include a customer booking form and an admin leads/customer details page.

existing_features.title: Add a dedicated login page for the BISMI CABS website that uses Internet Identity (no username/password) as the authentication method.
Implement the login UI content for BISMI CABS on the login page, including: app name 'BISMI CABS', the contact number '9500344749', and space for a brand logo.
Apply a coherent, cab-service-appropriate visual theme across the login page (colors, typography, layout) using a distinct style that aligns with the BISMI CABS branding.

Use the provided uploaded images as the basis for web-ready brand assets by producing cleaned/cropped logo images and placing them as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated, then render them on the login page.

Add a Booking Form page in the frontend that allows an authenticated user to submit a booking/lead with inputs for: customer name, customer phone, pickup location, drop location, pickup date/time, and notes.
Add a Leads page (customer details & leads) in the frontend that lists submitted booking leads in a clear table/list view and supports basic viewing of all captured fields per lead.

Update the app navigation so users can access Login, Booking Form, and Leads pages from within the app (mobile-friendly). After successful login, provide an obvious path to open the Booking Form and Leads pages.
Extend the existing React Query setup with queries/mutations for creating leads and listing leads, reusing the authenticated actor from the existing useActor hook.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a login page for the BISMI CABS website (user authentication entry point).
Add a minimal backend endpoint to confirm authentication by returning the callerâ€™s Principal (used by the frontend to show the logged-in identity state).
Add a customer booking form page to collect lead details (e.g., name, phone, pickup/drop, date/time, notes).
Add a leads/customer details page (admin view) to list and review submitted bookings/leads.
Implement backend storage and APIs to save booking form submissions and retrieve them for the leads/admin page.

Add backend data model and persistent storage for customer booking leads, including fields: leadId, customerName, customerPhone, pickupLocation, dropLocation, pickupDateTime (text), notes (optional), createdAt (timestamp), and createdBy (caller Principal).
Implement backend APIs to (1) create a new booking lead and (2) list booking leads for display on the leads page.
